word:
Well, I am happy to say this is the very best conference I ever attended in my life. It has been a feast to my soul from beginning to end. And when 


                                    -223- 

there is a prospect that my brethren will go into the fields that they may work in every branch in every way, why I have felt a spring of joy that was greater than I could express.--Ms 5, 1883, pp. 1, 11. (Sermon, November 20, 1883.) 

Released November 10, 1975.
